comment.author: 52000223@N08
comment._content:
If this is the protest for closure of Houghton st I remember it well and was on this protest as a Soc Admin student in the early 70s. A blind student had been knocked over by a taxi leading to this protest for pedestrian-ising the street. I was delighted to see the street was being closed to traffic when visiting my daughter who was a student on MA International Law in 2008. It took 30 years for the change to happen, but it was very reassuring to see that social action has results!
Barbara Goulborn
